name: Singularity.
description:
CONTROLS

UP ARROW, LEFT, RIGHT - Movement

DOWN ARROW - EXPLODE YOURSELF

WALL JUMP - SPAM left and right keys while holding up key

YOU CAN SKIP LEVELS IN THE SETTINGS ON THE TOP RIGHT CORNER! ENJOY :)

  • Mathematical singularity, a point at which a given mathematical object is not defined or not "well-behaved", for example, infinite or not differentiable

Singularity is a game where technology gets out of hand and a spirit (bio-mechanical) must traverse the ruins of the world duplicating itself which is against the law of mass. It is a glitch in the "simulation" and is the last remaining data of what went on in this simulation so the goal is to reach to the end and transfer the data. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are interested I have a discord server: https://discord.gg/dbt9m4vvwx

This was made for the Wowie Jam, so it was made around in 10 hours!
